title: Yasuo at 100% winrate...
body: in every match where his team wins the game. I swear... how can you let this champ have such high winrate whenever his team wins the game? It's obvious to everyone he's too op. Like the only time he has a lower winrate is when you look at his overall winrate or winrate for games where his team loses. But doing that last one would be biased and underestimate him.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Gentleman Gems,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zXVA7Vit,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-12T00:09:52.025+0000)
>
> _looking at first 2 comments_
> 
> https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/173/576/Wat8.jpg?1315930535

Right over their heads apparently haha.

But this is Memes and Games, the place where you go to make jokes.
How could a joke go over their heads when the place is meant for jokes?
because someone is talking about Yasuo and I would bet these people are Yasuo mains or something  of that nature.

There must be some conspiracy at Riot, and after this post I looked into it and Akali has a 100% WR when her team wins as well... we may have uncovered something big. 60% of the time it works every time.

https://champion.gg/champion/Yasuo/Middle

His winrate is in quite balance, but the reason for it is because how often you play yasuo vs yasuo

You're right... I completely forgot about that option. No wonder so many op champs have a winrate that makes them appear not broken.
If you can't beat him...

Also did anyone notice Riot decided to cover up how broken yasuo is by making him the "good guy" in their latest game mode? Now we must blindly project our dislike of yasuo onto kayn lol.
Well, personally I feel that they took Kayn mostly because of his character, Yasuo is truly annoying when it comes to the gameplay but lore-wise he is quite calm and positive person.
what about in ranked when he toasters out and becomes ineligible for lp even tho he carries everyone?
Yasuo? lol you need to play Taliyah against Yasuo.
